entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING

entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
